meanings.definition: To process (ores or other raw materials) in order to separate valuable elements from waste material.
meanings.sent1: The miners were beneficiating the ore to extract gold from it.
meanings.sent2: The company beneficiates the raw materials before using them in production.
meanings.sent3: The machines beneficiating the rocks seemed to be dancing in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: She was beneficiating the information, filtering out the irrelevant details.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's method of beneficiating the samples was both efficient and precise.

meanings.sent1: The beneficiating of the minerals was a crucial step in the production process.
meanings.sent2: After the beneficiating, the valuable elements were ready for extraction.
meanings.sent3: The noisy beneficiating of the raw materials echoed through the factory.
meanings.sent4: The beneficiating of the data revealed interesting patterns.
meanings.sent5: The beneficiating of the materials required careful attention to detail.
